firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_description: Elegant native stone home on 22+ acres of sandy loam soil with stately oaks and other native trees. This beautiful home has a cathedral ceiling in the great room living area, 2 dining areas, a modern kitchen, and many other fine touches. Large master bedroom with sitting area and wonderfully roomy bath with 2 walk-in closets, spa-type tub, and separate shower. The property has 2 ponds and is completely fenced. Enjoy country living in a serene setting with all the luxuries of a truly fine home.
